parameters.name: Axis
parameters.description: One of the following principal axes: 0 = X axis 1 = Y axis 2 = Z axis

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of the specified principal Axis VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of configuration names of size Config_numbers; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IMassProperty.ISetOverridePrincipleAxesOrientation
description: Overrides the orientation of the specified principal axis of inertia for the model currently being edited in this part or assembly document.

returns: True if orientation of principal axis is overridden, false if not
